about_the_game:
This is not your usual shift... Escape From Lesco is a horror/puzzle adventure, where you must navigate yourself through the Lesco superstore, and attempt to escape. You will have various tools to aid you during this, such as CCTV, VHS tapes, flashlights, and much more. However, be careful where you step, as you'll soon discover that your not alone...

Your First Shift At Lesco!
Welcome to your first night shift at the Lesco Superstore! Unfortunately, your manager has had to leave early due to... unforeseen circumstances, so you will have to do the close on your own. But not to worry! We are completely confident in your abilities to be able to handle this by yourself!



Game features:

  • High action gameplay, focusing on your stealth and sneaking abilities
  • Sandbox-style gameplay, with puzzles that will really make you think outside of the box
  • An enemy that will be constantly hunting you down, and learning from your every move

content_descriptors.notes: Instances of blood, and implied violence/death

detailed_description:
This is not your usual shift... Escape From Lesco is a horror/puzzle adventure, where you must navigate yourself through the Lesco superstore, and attempt to escape. You will have various tools to aid you during this, such as CCTV, VHS tapes, flashlights, and much more. However, be careful where you step, as you'll soon discover that your not alone...

Your First Shift At Lesco!
Welcome to your first night shift at the Lesco Superstore! Unfortunately, your manager has had to leave early due to... unforeseen circumstances, so you will have to do the close on your own. But not to worry! We are completely confident in your abilities to be able to handle this by yourself!

  • High action gameplay, focusing on your stealth and sneaking abilities
  • Sandbox-style gameplay, with puzzles that will really make you think outside of the box
  • An enemy that will be constantly hunting you down, and learning from your every move
name: Escape From Lesco

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) or newer (64-bit only)
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz or greater
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 8330 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: No
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Escape From Lesco is a horror/puzzle adventure, where you must survive through your night shift, navigating through various puzzles and obstacles within the store, in order to find a way to escape...
